incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 20/02/2025 07:30 UTC End time : 20/02/2025 09:30 UTC Service impact : You may experience micro cuts during maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple servers. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 24/02/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 25/02/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : Management will be temporarily unavailable for 1h30 during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vCenter Server services. An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Host replacement maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 24/02/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 28/02/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones. Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their hosts. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 24/02/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 28/02/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : vSphere will not be accesible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on NSX-V . Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU][Hosted Private Cloud] - SSL Gateway maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 24/02/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 28/02/2025 17:00 UTC Service impact : During the operation, access to SSL Gateway will be unavailable for 1 minute. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be doing a maintenance on the SSL Gateway. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 24/02/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 28/02/2025 17:00 UTC Service impact : Synchronisation between primary and secondary sites will be broken during the maintenance . Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on zerto. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

We are sorry to inform you that this maintenance is postponed to another date. New start time : 17/02/2025 08:00 UTC New end time : 21/02/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : vSphere will be temporarily unavailable for 1 hour during the maintenance. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 10/02/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 14/02/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : vSphere will be temporarily unavailable for 1 hour during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vCenter Server services. A communication will be done to inform customers of the maintenance. Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager. Thank you for your understanding.
